cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kutsu

sentence.kanji: 靴が汚れた。
sentence.romaji: kutsu ga yogoreta
sentence.english: My shoes got dirty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiniiru

sentence.kanji: 新しい靴がとても気に入りました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii kutsu ga totemo kiniirimashita
sentence.english: I really like my new shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kutsushita

sentence.kanji: この靴下は3足で1000円です。
sentence.romaji: kono kutsushita ha sansoku de senen desu
sentence.english: These socks are 1,000 yen for 3 pairs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sugoi

sentence.kanji: 凄い雨になった。
sentence.romaji: sugoi ame ni nata
sentence.english: It began raining cats and dogs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yatekuru

sentence.kanji: フランスからサーカスがやって来ます。
sentence.romaji: furansu kara sa-kasu ga yatekimasu
sentence.english: A circus is coming from France.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dekiagaru

sentence.kanji: この家は来年出来上がります。
sentence.romaji: kono ie ha rainen dekiagarimasu
sentence.english: This house will be completed next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kibun

sentence.kanji: 今日は最高にいい気分だよ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha saikou ni ii kibun da yo
sentence.english: I feel on top of the world today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dekiagari

sentence.kanji: 私は作品の出来上がりに満足しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sakuhin no dekiagari ni manzoku shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm satisfied with the completed work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samuke

sentence.kanji: 何だか寒気がします。
sentence.romaji: nandaka samuke ga shimasu
sentence.english: I feel chilly somehow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rainichi

sentence.kanji: 有名なバンドが来日していますね。
sentence.romaji: yuumei na bando ga rainichi shite imasu ne
sentence.english: A famous band has come to Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rieki

sentence.kanji: 先月の利益は200万円でした。
sentence.romaji: sengetsu no rieki ha 200 manen deshita
sentence.english: Last month's profit was two million yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuueki

sentence.kanji: 昨日の話し合いは有益でした。
sentence.romaji: kinou no hanashiai ha yuueki deshita
sentence.english: Yesterday's discussion was beneficial.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dekirudake

sentence.kanji: 出来るだけ早く来てください。
sentence.romaji: dekirudake hayaku kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please come as soon as possible.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gamen

sentence.kanji: テレビの画面が明るすぎる。
sentence.romaji: terebi no gamen ga akaru sugiru
sentence.english: The TV screen is too bright.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyoumen

sentence.kanji: 月の表面にはクレーターがたくさんあるね。
sentence.romaji: tsuki no hyoumen ni ha kure-ta- ga takusan aru ne
sentence.english: There are a lot of craters on the surface of the moon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bamen

sentence.kanji: ここがいちばん面白い場面です。
sentence.romaji: koko ga ichiban omoshiroi bamen desu
sentence.english: This is the most interesting place.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dekigoto

sentence.kanji: 面白い出来事がありました。
sentence.romaji: omoshiroi dekigoto ga arimashita
sentence.english: Something interesting happened.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mensuru

sentence.kanji: 私の家は川に面しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ie ha kawa ni menshite imasu
sentence.english: My house faces the river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanmen

sentence.kanji: テニスコートの半面を使って試合をしたの。
sentence.romaji: tenisuko-to no hanmen wo tsukate shiai wo shita no
sentence.english: We played tennis using one side of the court.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mensetsu

sentence.kanji: 新しい仕事の面接に行ってきました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii shigoto no mensetsu ni ite kimashita
sentence.english: I went to an interview for a new job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigaru

sentence.kanji: いつでも気軽に遊びに来て下さい。
sentence.romaji: itsudemo kigaru ni asobi ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please feel free to stop by any time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's irai

sentence.kanji: それ以来彼女に会ってない。
sentence.romaji: sore irai kanojo ni atenai
sentence.english: I haven't met her since then.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は最近元気がないですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha saikin genki ga nai desu ne
sentence.english: She has been in low spirits recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganrai

sentence.kanji: 彼は元来、真面目な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ganrai majime na hito desu
sentence.english: He is essentially a serious person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiryoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は気力にあふれていますね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kiryoku ni afurete imasu ne
sentence.english: He really has energy to spare.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikiki

sentence.kanji: 最近彼のところに行き来してないの。
sentence.romaji: saikin kare no tokoro ni ikiki shite nai no
sentence.english: I haven't been to his place lately.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yowaki

sentence.kanji: 彼は少し弱気になっています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sukoshi yowaki ni nate imasu
sentence.english: He's getting a little timid.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanki

sentence.kanji: 彼は短気な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tanki na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a short-tempered person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyoki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は強気な女性ですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tsuyoki na josei desu ne
sentence.english: She's a tough woman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gairaigo

sentence.kanji: 外来語は一般にカタカナで書かれます。
sentence.romaji: gairaigo ha ipanni katakana de kakaremasu
sentence.english: In general, loan words are written in katakana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenmenteki

sentence.kanji: 彼が全面的に協力してくれるそうです。
sentence.romaji: kare ga zenmenteki ni kyouryoku shite kureru sou desu
sentence.english: I hear that he'll cooperate completely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heimen

sentence.kanji: このメガネをかけると平面が立体に見えます。
sentence.romaji: kono megane wo kakeru to heimen ga ritai ni miemasu
sentence.english: When you wear these glasses, two-dimensional things look three-dimensional.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's namaiki

sentence.kanji: あの子は生意気だと思います。
sentence.romaji: ano ko ha namaiki da to omoimasu
sentence.english: That kid is quite cheeky, I think.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's men

sentence.kanji: 彼の意外な面を見た。
sentence.romaji: kare no igai na men wo mita
sentence.english: I saw an unexpected side of him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobidasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は道路に飛び出したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha douro ni tobidashita no
sentence.english: He ran out into the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobasu

sentence.kanji: 子供が紙飛行機を飛ばしています。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga kamihikouki wo tobashite imasu
sentence.english: The child is flying a paper airplane.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobiagaru

sentence.kanji: 大きな音にびっくりして飛び上がりました。
sentence.romaji: ooki na oto ni bikuri shite tobiagarimashita
sentence.english: I jumped in surprise at the loud noise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikou

sentence.kanji: このフライトの飛行時間は約3時間です。
sentence.romaji: kono furaito no hikou jikan ha yaku 3 jikan desu
sentence.english: The flight time is about three hours.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoumen

sentence.kanji: その家の正面には大きなバルコニーがあるの。
sentence.romaji: sono ie no shoumen ni ha ooki na barukoni- ga aru no
sentence.english: There is a large balcony at the front of the house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikou

sentence.kanji: 日本の気候は温暖です。
sentence.romaji: nihon no kikou ha ondan desu
sentence.english: The climate in Japan is temperate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heiki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は平気な顔をしていた。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha heiki na kao wo shite ita
sentence.english: She looked as if nothing had happened.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobikomu

sentence.kanji: カエルが池に飛び込んだね。
sentence.romaji: kaeru ga ike ni tobikonda ne
sentence.english: The frog jumped into the pond.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suimen

sentence.kanji: 湖の水面に小さく波が立っているな。
sentence.romaji: mizuumi no suimen ni chiisaku nami ga tate iru na
sentence.english: There are a lot of small waves on the surface of the lake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senmen

sentence.kanji: 洗面用具を忘れた。
sentence.romaji: senmen yougu wo wasureta
sentence.english: I forgot my toiletries.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senmenki

sentence.kanji: 洗面器でハンカチを洗ったの。
sentence.romaji: senmenki de hankachi wo arata no
sentence.english: I washed my handkerchief in a washbowl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizumeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女はソファーに体を沈めたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha sofua- ni karada wo shizumeta n da
sentence.english: She sank down into the sofa.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chinbotsu

sentence.kanji: 船は沈没しました。
sentence.romaji: fune ha chinbotsu shimashita
sentence.english: The ship sank.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shourai

sentence.kanji: 将来はパイロットになりたいです。
sentence.romaji: shourai ha pairoto ni naritai desu 。
sentence.english: I want to become a pilot in the future.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiraku

sentence.kanji: 将来は気楽な生活がしたいです。
sentence.romaji: shourai ha kiraku na seikatsu ga shitai desu
sentence.english: I want to have an easy life in the future.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shike

sentence.kanji: この部屋は暗くて湿気が多いね。
sentence.romaji: kono heya ha kurakute shike ga ooi ne
sentence.english: This room is dark and damp.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichimen

sentence.kanji: 外は一面の雪景色だったね。
sentence.romaji: soto ha ichimen no yukigeshiki data ne
sentence.english: It was a snowy landscape outside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukeiki

sentence.kanji: 今、あの国は不景気らしいよ。
sentence.romaji: ima ano kuni ha fukeiki rashii yo
sentence.english: Apparently, that country is in recession now.
